hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.tsx\?$'; then PLUGIN_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"; if [ -f "$PLUGIN_DIR/hooks/post-component-add.sh" ]; then bash "$PLUGIN_DIR/hooks/post-component-add.sh" "$file_path"; fi; fi; }
hooks.description: Run design system validation after component edits

hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.command' | { read cmd; if echo "$cmd" | grep -q 'git commit'; then PLUGIN_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"; if [ -f "$PLUGIN_DIR/hooks/pre-commit.sh" ]; then bash "$PLUGIN_DIR/hooks/pre-commit.sh"; fi; fi; }
hooks.description: Run design system validation before git commits

hooks.command: jq -r '.prompt' | { read prompt; if echo "$prompt" | grep -qiE '(/nextjs-frontend:add-component|add.*component)'; then echo '[DESIGN-SYSTEM] Remember to validate with /nextjs-frontend:enforce-design-system after completion'; fi; }
hooks.description: Remind to validate design system after adding components
